content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(2.5, 2.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Small electric pole (position 2.5, 2.5) 
- Lab (position 2.5, 2.5) which is currently not powered

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 0, 0) with coal as fuel and producing iron plates
- Furnace (position 2, 0) with coal as fuel but currently has no ingredients to smelt
- Wooden chest (position 3.5, 0.5) with no items in inventory

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing new pole
- Ensure that the first argument is a valid Prototype object before attempting to place a new pole.

### Errors when the lab is not powered
- Check the power supply to the lab and ensure it is connected to a power source.

### Errors related to insufficient ingredients for research
- Make sure to have the required ingredients (10 automation-science-packs) in inventory before starting the research.
